skills.name: Flower Pick
skills.desc: Tosses 1 jade tile from the suit with the fewest tiles in hand to deal Quantum DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of Qingque's ATK to a single enemy.

skills.name: A Scoop of Moon
skills.desc: Immediately draws <unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak> jade tile(s) and increases DMG by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak></color> until the end of the current turn. This effect can stack up to <unbreak>#3[i]</unbreak> time(s). The turn will not end after this Skill is used.

skills.name: A Quartet? Woo-hoo!
skills.desc: Deals Quantum DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of Qingque's ATK to all enemies, and obtain 4 jade tiles of the same suit.

skills.name: Celestial Jade
skills.desc: When an ally's turn starts, Qingque randomly draws 1 tile from 3 different suits and can hold up to 4 tiles at one time.\nIf Qingque starts her turn with 4 tiles of the same suit, she consumes all tiles to enter the "Hidden Hand" state.\nWhile in this state, Qingque cannot use her Skill again. At the same time, Qingque's ATK increases by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color>, and her Basic ATK "Flower Pick" is enhanced, becoming "Cherry on Top!" The "Hidden Hand" state ends after using "Cherry on Top!".

skills.name: Game Solitaire
skills.desc: After using Technique, Qingque draws <unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak> jade tile(s) when the battle starts.

skills.name: Cherry on Top!
skills.desc: Deals Quantum DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of Qingque's ATK to a single enemy, and deals Quantum DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak></color> of Qingque's ATK to enemies adjacent to it.\n"Cherry on Top!" cannot recover Skill Points.

eidolons.name: Sleep on the Tiles
eidolons.desc: Every time Draw Tile is triggered, Qingque immediately regenerates <unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak> Energy.

eidolons.name: Read Between the Tiles
eidolons.desc: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>.\nTalent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>.

eidolons.name: Right on the Tiles
eidolons.desc: After this character's Skill is used, there is a <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> fixed chance to gain Autarky, which lasts until the end of the current turn. \nWith Autarky, using Basic ATK or Enhanced Basic ATK immediately launches 1 follow-up attack on the same target, dealing Quantum DMG equal to <unbreak>100%</unbreak> of the previous Basic ATK (or Enhanced Basic ATK)'s DMG.

eidolons.name: Gambit for the Tiles
eidolons.desc: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>.\nBasic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>10</unbreak>.

eidolons.name: Prevail Beyond the Tiles
eidolons.desc: Recovers 1 Skill Point after using Enhanced Basic ATK.

skillTree.name: Tile Battle
skillTree.desc: Restores 1 Skill Point when using the Skill. This effect can only be triggered 1 time per battle.

skillTree.name: Bide Time
skillTree.desc: Using the Skill increases DMG Boost effect of attacks by an extra <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak>.

skillTree.name: Winning Hand
skillTree.desc: Qingque's SPD increases by <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> for 1 turn after using the Enhanced Basic ATK.
